summary: This standalone mod add two sneaky / assassins type follower respectively specialized in dual-wielding and spellsword combat. 7B / UNP / UNPB / CBBE Body. Single ESP.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9][b][size=5][center][/center]Introduction[/size][/b][/color][/font]

Hello everyone !

So this is my 2nd follower mod but my english is always this bad!! So for talking about the mod.. i wanted to do more sneaky / assassin type followers this time.

Shaelyn and Yzandra are two standalone followers, thats mean you need nothing else than my mod for Shaelyn and Yzandra to look like in my screenshots.I highly recommend [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face light[/url][/b] because it's awesome, if you dont use it already give it a try :p

SeveNBase - UNP - UNPB - CBBE Body are available right now, each with both 0 or 100 Weight options. Just pick the one you want, there is also ESP files alone under optional tab if you change your mind about weight and don't want to download again all the files. Simply overwrite the old one.

Convert for others body could be still coming soon.

Special Thanks to [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21459/?]Nouserheres Ears[/url][/b] Author, Shaelyn is now totally standalone with 1.0.1 Update !



Like said above Shaelyn and Yzandra are mainly two sneaky / Assassin type followers but with some particularity for differentiate each others.
[i][color=#d5a6bd][size=4]


[b]Shaelyn[/b][/size][/color][/i] is kind of a Spellsword with some sneaky attributes, wearing mainly leather armor but can also wear some plate armor, she use Lightning Spell for take down mages. You will find her in Honnorall Orphanage (Riften).

She start only with an iron sword and leather armor.

[color=#ffe599][size=4][b][i]Yzandra[/i][/b][/size][/color] is a full melee type assassin using dual wielding, sneaky attributes, wearing leather armor and she also become a specialist for unlocking things ! You will find her in The Bee and Barb (Riften).

She start with two iron swords and leather armor.

[b][font=Georgia][size=5][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/l55jqDA.png[/img][/center][color=#a2c4c9]Characters [/color][/size][/font][/b]

[i]" Well.. What to say.. we don't know much about their past, why are they in Skyrim right now.. you could try to find out some clues, though some already tried but we never heard of them again.. so basically its not a good idea this could backfire against you and maybe its better to not know. But there is an obvious thing : Shaelyn and Yzandra don't seem to be accustom to Skyrim, they arrived recently in Riften but it also looks like they joined recently our Nordic lands. Also.. the scary one.. i mean Yzandra don't like some kinds of Nords but Shaelyn don't seem to care so much about that, especially with childrens, you could even sometimes find her in the orphanage playing with them, however she plan to get rid of Grelod.. but sshhh.

The twins deal with us since recently.. yeah.. i won't give you the details but they do pretty well.. i think they also have some links with the Dark Brotherhood and when... i mean.. well.. no.. nothing. I don't want to talk too much about that.

Oh, wait.. Another obvious thing : They are twins sisters, yeah yeah. Really, haha! They look -almost- the same but their personalities are completly different in some point Shaelyn is more shy and kind with cute manners when Yzandra is a bit more rough and mature but keep some elegance..            Though they in fact.. do have a lot in common too as twin sisters.. but remind well that.. don't forget.. the most commons traits they share : Both are skillful, merciless, cold and deadly assassin behind these lovely faces.[/i] "


[u][b]
Basic Info[/b][/u]

[color=#d5a6bd][size=4][b][i]
Shaelyn[/i][/b][/size][/color]

Level : Lvl up with player

Marriageable : Yes

Body : SeveNBase / UNP / UNPB / CBBE ( Height 0.96 - Weight 0 )
[list][*][color=#d5a6bd]Optional Weight 100 in Download Section.[/color]
[/*]
[/list]
Location : Riften, Honnorhall Orphanage

Default Outfit : 

- Leather Armor

- Iron Sword

[b][size=4]Spells[/size] :[/b]
[u][b]
Lightning Element[/b][/u]

- Thunderbolt
- Lightning Cloak Left Hand
- ChainLightning Left Hand
- Sparks Left Hand
- Lightning Bolt Left Hand
[u][b]
Alteration[/b][/u]

- Oakflesh
- Stoneflesh
- Ironflesh
- Ebonyflesh
[size=4][b]
Perks[/b][/size] :

[u][b][i]One-Handed[/i][/b][/u]

- Armsman
- Fighting Stance
- Bladesman
- Critical Charge
- Paralyzing Strike

[u][b][i]Destruction[/i][/b][/u]

- Master Destruction
- Augmented Shock
- Disintegrate
 
[u][b][i]Sneak[/i][/b][/u]

- Stealth
- Muffled Movement
- Light Foot
- Silent Roll
- Silence

[b][u][i]Light Armor[/i][/u][/b]

- Agile Defender
- Custom Fit
- Unhindered
- Deft Movement

[u][i][b]Heavy Armor[/b][/i][/u]

- Juggernaut
- Well Fitted
- Matching Set


[color=#ffe599][size=4][b][i]Yzandra[/i][/b][/size][/color]

Level : Lvl up with player

Marriageable : Yes

Body : SeveNBase / UNP / UNPB / CBBE ( Height 0.96 - Weight 0 )
[list][*][color=#ffe599]Optional Weight 100 in Download Section[/color]
[/*]
[/list]
Location : Riften, The Bee and Barb

Default Outfit : 

- Leather Armor

- Iron Sword x2

[size=4][b]Perks[/b][/size] :

[u][b][i]One-Handed[/i][/b][/u]

- Armsman
- Fighting Stance
- Bladesman
- Critical Charge
- Paralyzing Strike
- Dual Flurry
- Dual Savagery
- Savage Strike

[u][b][i]Sneak

[/i][/b][/u]- Stealth
- BackStab
- Deadly Aim
- Assassin's Blade
- Muffled Movement
- Light Foot
- Silence
- Shadow Warrior

[u][b][i]Lockpicking[/i][/b][/u]

- Master Locks
- Quick Hands
- Treasure Hunter

[b][u][i]Light Armor[/i][/u][/b]

- Agile Defender
- Custom Fit
- Unhindered
- Deft Movement

[b][font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9][size=5]
Requirement[/size][/color][/font][/b]

[size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21459/?][color=#ffe599]No More Requirement with 1.0.1 Update[/color][/url][/b][/size]


[font=Georgia][color=#e69138][size=5][center][b]

Important Known Issues
[size=6]MUST READ [/size][/b][size=6] [/size]
[b][size=6]REEEEAAAAD[/size][/b][/center]

[/size][/color][/font][center][size=2][b]
[/b][/size][size=2]First thing to do if Black Face : Use BOSS[/size] / LOOT[size=2] or move .esp to the bottom of load order.
Some people seems to have issue like purple/black textures, so i added Medium Textures in download section
under [b][color=#ffe599]Miscellaneous Tab[/color][/b]. Give it a try if you have purple/black textures body / face issues. THANKS.
There is also less high textures available than Medium if you have really really really low-end machines.
I did not already uploaded a Small textures version so if you want to do it yourself -[b][color=#d5a6bd]Not for CBBE users, only UNP(B) - SeveNBase[/color][/b]- download "[/size][size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000120412]V06 SMALL[/url][/b]" from [size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Here[/url][/b][/size] and then its fairly easy. You just have to navigate to :
[/size][/center][size=2]
[/size][size=2][font=Georgia][color=#e69138]  [/color][/font]                                                                   Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data\Textures\Actors\Character\Yzandra
     
[center][color=#ffe599][b]AND[/b][/color]
[size=2]
Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data\Textures\Actors\Character\[/size]Shaelyn[/center]

[/size][center][size=4][size=2]and then overwrite only 3 files, done.[/size][b]

[/b][size=2][i][b]Files to overwrite[/b][/i] :
femalebody_1.dds
femalehands_1.dds
femalehead.dds[/size][b]
[/b][/size][/center]

[color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=5]
Recommended Mods[/size][/font][/b][/color]

Wjun Lady Armor - UNPB
Vampire Bride Armor - 7B[/color]

[/b]
[b][size=5][font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9]
Change log[/color][/font]
[/size][/b][b]
2014.12.20
[/b][list][*][color=#d5a6bd][size=1][b]Release[/b][/size][/color][/*]
[*][size=1][b][color=#d5a6bd]Added SINGLE ESP VERSION[/color][/b][/size][/*]

[/list][b]2014.12.24
[/b][list][*][color=#d5a6bd][b]Added[/b] a fully Standalone Version (Shaelyn ears) [u][i]Nouserheres Ears is no more required[/i][/u][/color][/*]
[/list][b]2014.12.29[font=Georgia][color=#cc4125]
[/color][/font][/b][list][*][font=Georgia][color=#d5a6bd][size=1]Added Medium Textures for All Body (CBBE - UNP - UNPB - SeveNBase)[/size][/color][/font]

[size=5][b][youtube]oW9_cto2RRQ[/youtube]
[size=4]Take a look at his [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOBIhGllq8jQq95AfH93asg]youtube channel[/url][/size][/b][/size]
[b][font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9][size=5]
My Other Mod[/size][/color][/font][/b][b]

[center][font=Tahoma][color=#ffe599][size=4]
Nihel
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61227/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/ziwiiEO.png[/img][/url]
Jahiya[/size][/color][/font][/center][/b][center][b][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61075/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/SNgfY0r.png[/img][/url]

[font=Tahoma][b][color=#ffe599][size=4]Brynhild[/size][/color][/b][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60772/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/HgRDS5s.png[/img][/url][/center]
[b]
                            [/b][color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=5]
Last words[/size][/font][/b][/color]

I hope i forgot nothing o: was fun but a pain sometimes to make this mod works correctly :DD i hope you'll enjoy it. I'll probably add some more options, hairstyles, tweaks etc.. but not right now, im done :DD

Feel free to comment, add screenshots, ask questions or even giving me constructive criticism.

And the most important Have fun in Skyrim, cya !
